title: Video game voice actors are gonna go on strike
body:
hahaha what a fucking joke.
they want fucking royalties for their work.
they're literally the only people that you don't need for a video game.

source: http://nichegamer.com/2015/10/video-game-voice-actor-union-authorizes-strike/

opinions on this? I think it's laughable how seriously they're taking themself.
